channel.title: Comments on: Google Releases API For Charts

item.title: By: The Trials And Tribulations Of 10KB » Coding » Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: The Trials And Tribulations Of 10KB » Coding » Russell Heimlich
item.description: [...] had in their deck as the game progressed. Building that feature was pretty simple thanks to the Google Charts API but in the end it had to be cut in order to get below the 10KB [...]
item.content:encoded: […] had in their deck as the game progressed. Building that feature was pretty simple thanks to the Google Charts API but in the end it had to be cut in order to get below the 10KB […]

item.title: By: Jon
item.dc:creator: Jon
item.description:
Hi,
I've written a page to build some of the basic Google Charts.
Not sure whether to carry on with it as more functionality would take a lot of effort.
Let me know what you think.
<a href="http://www.jonwinstanley.com/charts/" rel="nofollow">Google Charts</a>
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I’ve written a page to build some of the basic Google Charts.

Not sure whether to carry on with it as more functionality would take a lot of effort.

Let me know what you think.

Google Charts

Thanks!
